org.youscope.common.microscope

Interface Property

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FloatProperty, IntegerProperty, ReadOnlyProperty, SelectableProperty, StringProperty

    public interface Property
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Represents a property of a device.
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDeviceID()
      Returns the name of the device where this property belongs to.
      java.lang.String getPropertyID()
      Returns the name of the device property.
      PropertyType getType()
      Returns the type of this device property.
      java.lang.String getValue()
      Returns the current value of the device property as a string.
      boolean isEditable()
      Returns true if property is editable and false if not.
      void setValue(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the current value of the property.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceID

        java.lang.String getDeviceID()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the name of the device where this property belongs to.
        Returns:
        Name of device.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getPropertyID

        java.lang.String getPropertyID()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the name of the device property.
        Returns:
        Name of property.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getType

        PropertyType getType()
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the type of this device property.
        Returns:
        Type of property.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                          MicroscopeException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns the current value of the device property as a string.
        Returns:
        Value of property.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.lang.String value)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
              MicroscopeException,
              MicroscopeLockedException,
              java.lang.InterruptedException,
              DeviceException
        Sets the current value of the property. Throws a device exception if the value is not valid (i.e. if the property is an integer property and the value is not an integer), or if the property is not editable.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to set the property to.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeException
        MicroscopeLockedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        DeviceException - Thrown if value does not correspond to property type.

      • isEditable

        boolean isEditable()
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns true if property is editable and false if not.
        Returns:
        True if editable, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
